price: Vërtet, urdhri i Tij, kur Ai dëshiron diçka, është që t’i thotë asaj “Bëhu!” - dhe ajo bëhet.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: innamā amruhu idhā arāda shayan an yaqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
